confirmed_facts: ElevenLabs announced its entry into the Korean market on 2025-11-21.
The company plans to establish a dedicated Korean engineering team to provide customized AI voice services.
ElevenLabs claims that Koreaâ€™s rapid AI adoption, infrastructure, and innovation make it an ideal hub for advancing voice AI in Asia.
The companyâ€™s TTS technology has attracted over 50 million monthly active users worldwide.

timeline.event: ElevenLabs CEO announces Korean market entry and commitment to build a Korean engineering team.
